data.title: Lower support cost
data.description: Mirror handles a lot of repititive questions from users, thereby reducing the volume of incoming requests to your support agents.

data.title: Knowledge in one place
data.description: Achieve a single unified knowledge source - be it internal information restricted to your employees or open information available to your users.

data.title: Multiple resolution channels
data.description: Address user issues by more than one means. User issues can be resolved by auto bots, other users and support agents.
